CatDescriptText: Ozell Hamilton, laborer, 55 Independence Street, West End was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1957, pg. 8 with question: "Do you think the city wage tax, which is one-half of one percent of your wage, is fair or unfair?" Answer reads: "I think that it is unfair because as present we are paying taxes on everything that we buy."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ozell Hamilton wearing baseball cap and striped shirt, posed in front of brick building with wrought iron fence
